Deprecated API

Deprecated Fields
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag.EVAL_BODY_TAG
          As of Java JSP API 1.2, use BodyTag.EVAL_BODY_BUFFERED or IterationTag.EVAL_BODY_AGAIN.
